All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DarkerFilter
An image filter to make the image a bit darker.
Demo
Clase de ejecuci√≥n
EdgeFilter
An image filter to detect edges and highlight them, a bit like a colored pencil drawing.
Filter
Filter is an abstract superclass for all image filters in this application.
FishEyeFilter
An image filter to create an effect similar to a fisheye camera lens.
GrayScaleFilter
An image filter to remove color from an image.
ImageFileManager
ImageFileManager is a small utility class with static methods to load and save images.
ImagePanel
An ImagePanel is a Swing component that can display an OFImage.
ImageViewer
ImageViewer is the main class of the image viewer application.
InvertFilter
An image filter to invert colors.
LighterFilter
An image filter to make the image a bit lighter.
MirrorFilter
An image filter to mirror (flip) the image horizontally.
OFImage
Clase OfImage
PixelizeFilter
An image filter to create a pixelization effect, like an enlarged low-resolution digital image.
SmoothFilter
An image filter to reduce sharp edges and pixelization.
SolarizeFilter
An image filter to create a solarization effect.
ThresholdFilter
An three-level gray-based threshold filter.
